entries.text: Thank you for calling Technical Support. Please wait while we connect you with the next available agent.
Thank you for calling. My name is Alex. How can I help you today?
I've been on the phone for an hour! My computer keeps crashing, giving me some ridiculous error code, and none of your basic troubleshooting steps worked. I need real help.
I understand your frustration, sir. Can you please tell me the error code you are receiving?
It's 0x0000007B. I already told the last guy this! It points to a potential hardware failure. I think the hard drive is going bad.
Okay, thank you. I'm going to try some basic troubleshooting steps first. Have you tried restarting your computer?
ARE YOU KIDDING ME? I just told you I've been through all of that! This isn't my first rodeo. I need someone who knows what they're doing. Is there a way to talk with someone from Tier 2 support?
I understand. Let me see if I can transfer you to a technical specialist in our Tier 2 department. Please hold.
Please wait while we connect you.
Thank you for calling Tier 2 Support. My name is Ben. How can I help you today?

FINALLY. Okay, look, my computer is crashing, I'm getting a STOP error with the code 0x0000007B, and I suspect a hardware failure, specifically with the hard drive. I've already gone through basic troubleshooting. I need advanced troubleshooting at this point.
Alright, I understand. So, you've already restarted the computer and checked the drivers?
ARE YOU EVEN LISTENING?! I said I've done all the basic stuff! This is unbelievable! I've been on the phone for over an hour explaining the same thing to everyone! Is anyone even reading the notes?!
Sir, I understand your frustration. Let me access your account information. Can you verify the last four digits of your social security number?
Seriously? I have to go through this AGAIN? I am not giving my social security number over the phone. I just want my computer fixed. This is a hardware failure, can you replace the drive or not?!

I understand your concern. Without verifying your account, I am limited in the actions I can take. For security purposes, I need to confirm your identity before proceeding with any advanced troubleshooting or discussing hardware replacements.
This is ridiculous! I'm hanging up. You're absolutely useless.
